extendedInfo.description: Inspirational Quotes,liners from the life of exceptionally great people, history has seen to make you feel inspired,energized.Quote instances from the life of Albert Einstein,Mother Teressa,Marilyn Monroe,Edison and many more that helped them to keep them going and conqueror the challenges to achieve their pinnacle of dreams.Every day we will deliver a Quote to you for new insight to the journey called life. Daily Quote will strive to take you out of the depression,low confidence,apathy by presenting quotes from the life of personalities who were common and just their thinking,beliefs helped them to go on and on in spite of personal,social,physical obstacles to attain their path of Zen.We present to you that exact beliefs and thinking.NO INTERNET CONNECTION/SMS CHARGES ARE REQUIRED FOR RECEIVING YOUR DAILY QUOTEQuotes by the means of widget is also provided.Changes and Updates in the Pipeline1. Configurable design/screen changes.2. Integrating your Daily quotes to various social networks facebook,twitter SMS,Gmail etc.3. Making settings like font-color,font-size configurable based on current theme and design.4. Quotes from books,religious papers,documents with images.feedbacks and recommendations are welcome so that we can improve application.
